imdb.title: Kingdom
imdb.plot: In ancient China, a young boy dreams of becoming the greatest general of the Qin Kingdom.

episodes.title: Seven Nations, After the War
episodes.plot: The war between the coalition and the Qin State ended in victory for the latter. One year after the events.

episodes.title: Ominous Shadow
episodes.plot: Internal dissension escalates in Qin's court. Ryo Fui's faction does everything to win against that of the king, with some success. Sei Kyou, Ei Sei's half-brother, now seems to be working for the nation's best interests. On the other hand, the state of Zhao goes back on the offensive, against all odds.

episodes.title: Departure of the Punitive Force
episodes.plot: Sei Kyou manages to push back Zhao's army, but a little too easily for his taste. He discovers that Tonryuu, the city of his wife Rui, is now administered by Ho Kaku, who looks like an intriguing.

episodes.title: Assault on Tunliu
episodes.plot: The arrival of the Hi Shin unit allows Heki's army to win the first round of the battle, but it is now a race against time: Shin and Kyoukai must find Sei Kyou as soon as possible, lest the enemy never executes him and never bury the truth about his schemes.

episodes.title: Sword and Shield
episodes.plot: Hokaku and his men have finally caught up with Sei Kyou, who will have to face them alone alongside Shukan. His wife Rui, who has gone to seek help, comes across Shin and Kyoukai.

episodes.title: A New Strategic Base
episodes.plot: In order to continue its expansion towards the east, the country of Qin must break a lock on its border with Wei: Choyou, where General Tou will have to face a known figure, Go Houmei.

episodes.title: The Call
episodes.plot: The battle against the vanguard of Wei's army in Choyou has begun. The general Gai Mou and the strategist Jun Sou leave their camp to observe the situation, but the first one does not resist to the idea to challenge Shin in duel.

episodes.title: Ten's Existence
episodes.plot: Shin and his comrades wonder how to free Ka Ryo Ten, whom they fear the worst will happen to him. Kyou Kai then suggests a prisoner exchange, since she managed to capture Jun Sou, Wei's strategist from Gai Mou.

episodes.title: Zi Bai's Name
episodes.plot: Ouhon will for the first time face Count Shi, famous for his mastery of the spear. It is in truth him who is at the origin of the conflict which opposed the Dragons of fire of Wei, fourteen years before, for reasons which Reiou will expose.

episodes.title: The Eyes of the Middle Kingdom
episodes.plot: Ou Hon's strategy seems to be in difficulty on this second day of fighting in Choyou. The fateful date of the third day, when the armies of Ou Hon, Shin and Roku O Mi are supposed to meet in front of the HQ of Go Hou Mei, is coming.

episodes.title: Training Days
episodes.plot: The Hi Shin Unit has only half a day left to reach Go Hou Mei's headquarters. The strategists of both sides, Ka Ryo Ten and Jun Sou, will be able to test their skills.

episodes.title: Age of Giants
episodes.plot: This is the hour of truth. The three troops of Qin must attack simultaneously the HQ of Wei where Go Hou Mei is. On their success depends the victory of the battle of Choyou.

episodes.title: Movement in Xianyang
episodes.plot: The battle of Choyou is ending, and Qin will have to decide which move to make before advancing eastward. Ei Sei has a clear idea, but a faction will appear at the most unexpected moment.

episodes.title: A New Nation
episodes.plot: The plans of the Queen Mother and her lover Rou Ai soon come to light: the foundation of a new state, within Qin itself. The affront is such that it calls for a response equal to it.

episodes.title: The Man Who Was Nothing
episodes.plot: While Shin and Ou Hon are promoted, the state of Ai continues to grow, and this is beginning to seriously worry the capital city of Kanyou.

episodes.title: The Crowning Cerimony
episodes.plot: Minister Ko Reki plots to force the State of Ai to strike Kanyou preemptively, but Rou Ai does not see it that way. The Queen Mother quickly understands that she has been tricked and that she will have to play the strategist again.

episodes.title: Three Sides, Unyielding
episodes.plot: While the ceremony of majority and coronation of Ei Sei takes place in the Kinen palace, the army of the State of Ai, led by Rou Ai and the general Han O Ki, manages to cross the gate

episodes.title: River-Crossing Battle
episodes.plot: While Ei Sei continues his coming of age and coronation ceremony, Shin and his men rush to Kanyou to intercept the rebel army. The latter sends a detachment to nip the threat in the bud.

episodes.title: A Parting of Ways
episodes.plot: While the battle of Kanyou is already underway, Shin and his men arrive and discover to their horror that the gates of the city are already open.

episodes.title: A Dream Nation
episodes.plot: While Shin's troops enter Kanyou to protect Ei Sei's children, Ei Sei, still in the ancient capital You, has a meeting with his rival Ryo Fui. It is time for each of them to explain their vision of the world and their plans.

episodes.title: Our Only Shot at Victory
episodes.plot: Ryo Fui continues to expound his vision of the ideal government to the state of Qin, while the fighting continues outside and inside Kanyou. On his side, Shin tries to reach the inner palace in order to save Ei Sei.

episodes.title: Running for Your Lives
episodes.plot: The race is on between the supporters of the Ai State, who are hunting down the children of Ei Sei in order to eliminate them, and the troops of Qin, who are doing their best to stop them.

episodes.title: Reversal Rush
episodes.plot: Outnumbered, Shou Hei Kun and his troops will try a daring maneuver to neutralize the Duke of Juuteki.

episodes.title: The Rebellion's Conclusion
episodes.plot: As the rebel army flees north and tries to return to the state of Ai, news of their defeat reaches Ryo Fui and Ei Sei, who are still in the city of You. The consequences will be absolutely major for the future of Qin.

episodes.title: A Time for Venturing Forth
episodes.plot: The Queen Mother continues to plead for clemency for the two children she had with Rou Ai, but circumstances are unfavorable for her cause.

episodes.title: The Six Great Generals' Whereabouts
episodes.plot: Qin goes right back to the battlefield; Wa Lin is asked to help the troubled nation of Chu.

episodes.title: The Encroaching Coalition Army
episodes.plot: All's quiet in the kingdom of Qin until not one, but three armies attack--and, as a steady stream of messengers reveals, that's just the half of it.

episodes.title: A Coming Together
episodes.plot: The kingdom of Qin is under attack from all sides.

episodes.title: The Battle of Hangu Pass
episodes.plot: Although the army of the kingdom of Qi had defected and left the coalition, the latter was still powerful.

episodes.title: Two Battlefields
episodes.plot: General Duke Hyou has launched the charge on Zhao's army where he is wreaking havoc with the Hi Shin unit. But soon, he will have to face the terrible deputy general of Ri Boku: Kei Sha.

episodes.title: Rise of a Young General
episodes.plot: While Go Hou Mei, the Supreme Commander of Wei, surprises Qin with his siege towers, another battlefield.

episodes.title: A Mutual Self-Confidence
episodes.plot: Mou Bu's strategy is simple: the country of Qin must slaughter the first army of Chu, led by the general Rin Bu Kun, in order to force the second and third to come out of the woodwork. But Rin Bu Kun turns out to be a formidable opponent.

episodes.title: A Wasteland Riddled with Holes
episodes.plot: While Ka Ryo Ten enters the fray to reunite the Qin troops that the chaos has scattered, Shin advances to General Man Goku, who is going to tell the great massacre of Chouhei.

episodes.title: Heroic Woman Ka Rin
episodes.plot: The first day of the battle of Kankoku is finally over, and the army of Qin has held its ground. The second day will see an atypical general of Chu's army enter the scene: Ka Rin, a woman with a strong character.

episodes.title: Mo Bu's Speech
episodes.plot: The war of continues between the coalition and the State of Qin, but the latter's strategists sense that there is something behind it. Indeed, on the fifteenth day of the battle, the coalition will finally launch its general offensive.

episodes.title: Great Selection of Predicament
episodes.plot: On the side of the Kankoku gate, Go Hou Mei, the generalissimo of the country of Wei, will again use a new weapon of which he has the secret. This fifteenth day will be decisive for the whole country of Qin.

episodes.title: The Pride of the General
episodes.plot: Knowing that he is doomed by the poison, Chou Tou agrees to follow Kan Ki and takes the siege tower to reach the battlefield. Kan Ki, Chou Tou and their men are about to execute the most audacious strategy of the Kankoku battle.

episodes.title: Wa Lin Army's Assault
episodes.plot: To the right of the Kankoku Gate, Great General Ordo leads the Yan army, but also 8,000 elite soldiers of the northern mountain tribes. Faced with their superiority, General Ou Sen of the Qin country is forced to retreat tactically.

episodes.title: Strongest
episodes.plot: Mou Bu (Meng Wu) takes on Kan Mei (Han Ming) to decide who is the strongest general in the Middle Kingdom.

episodes.title: The Strongest Man
episodes.plot: The duel between generals Kan Mei and Mou Bu continues, but its outcome still seems uncertain. It is then that general Ka Rin will try to influence the course of it. On the side of the Kankoku gate, the fights are still raging.

episodes.title: Inside Hangu Pass
episodes.plot: Ka Rin's strategy is finally revealed. Her elite troops have managed to catch the Qin soldiers in the back, just behind the Kankoku gate. They only have to open the gate from the inside to allow the coalition troops to surge in.

episodes.title: Li Mu's Whereabouts
episodes.plot: The coalition has failed to take Kankoku's gate and its chances of success are now slim. While Qin HQ believes that victory is within reach, Ri Boku executes an unexpected maneuver that reshuffles the cards.

episodes.title: Epitome of the Instinctual Type
episodes.plot: Duke Hyou gets ready to battle Riboku, however, it's not him who will be fighting. Houken makes an entrance and it's him who will be taking on Hyou. He states that Houken doesn't give an aura of general but that of overpowering martial.

episodes.title: Zheng's Decision
episodes.plot: The survivors of General Duke Hyou's army, exhausted, head for the capital Kanyou. Panic takes hold of the palace, while Ryo Fui's faction seems to be plotting in the shadows to take advantage of the situation.

episodes.title: Zheng Speaks
episodes.plot: The city of Sai is the last bastion of the capital Kanyou, but there are hardly any people left there except for old men, women and children. Ei Sei cannot force civilians to take up arms, but he can make them want to.

episodes.title: The First Night
episodes.plot: Thanks to Ei Sei's speech, the armed civilians of Sai are determined to defend their country, but they are still amateurs. Ri Boku is going to take advantage of this to develop an original strategy, which will start at nightfall.

episodes.title: Secret Exposed
episodes.plot: The stakes are clear. Ri Boku's army continues to exhaust Sai's, while the latter has to hold out until the former runs out of supplies.

episodes.title: Using Up Everything
episodes.plot: Now that Ri Boku knows that the King of Qin is present in the city of Sai, his objective is no longer the same. He wants to invade the city to capture the king and negotiate the surrender of the capital.

episodes.title: Exceptional Support
episodes.plot: The miracle took place: the mountain people, led by Yo Tan Wa, who had already come to Qin's aid during Sei Kyou's coup attempt four years ago.

episodes.title: Sincere Gratitude
episodes.plot: If the intervention of the people of the mountains reshuffled the cards in the battle of Sai, Shin must still face Hou Ken, the fallen of the generals Ou Ki and Hyou.

episodes.title: Difference in Dances
episodes.plot: The country of Qin celebrates its victory in its capital Kanyou, with a ceremony rewarding the warriors. On the other hand, Kyou Kai, who left the Hi Shin unit to avenge his sister, is getting closer and closer to his target.

episodes.title: A Different Path
episodes.plot: Kyou Kai continues to confront Yuu Ren's subordinates, but preserves herself for the latter. It is time to avenge Kyou Shou, it is time to clear the past.

episodes.title: New Era
episodes.plot: Former servant Xin now commands 300 troops in the formidable Fei Xin Force--and the big battle he's itching for may be right around the corner.

episodes.title: A Quiet Battlefield
episodes.plot: Zhao's master tactician Li Mu is forced into negotiations with Qin's crafty LÃ¼ Buwei. What will the outcome mean for the future of their kingdoms?

episodes.title: A Tumultuous Banquet
episodes.plot: Xin confronts Li Mu, the man who orchestrated Wang Yi's battlefield defeat, while Diao touches base with Kaine. Zheng reveals his future plans.

episodes.title: Kings and Ants
episodes.plot: Xin gets a lead on a big battle that could propel him up the ranks to general, but soon learns he's not the only young, ambitious warrior around.

episodes.title: A Third Force
episodes.plot: As the Fei Xin and Yu Feng Forces play at one-upmanship, Si Shi proposes a surprising potential ally in Zheng's power struggle with LÃ¼ Buwei.

episodes.title: Beautiful Venom
episodes.plot: Zheng's supporters discuss the pros and cons of bringing the Queen Dowager onto their side, while Zheng takes matters into his own hands.

episodes.title: A Cursed Prince
episodes.plot: Zheng tells Xiang about his days as a young hostage in Zhao, and about the unexpected people called upon to get him safely back to the Kingdom of Qin.

episodes.title: Zheng and Zi Xia
episodes.plot: The flashback to young Zheng's escape from hostile Zhao to his Qin homeland reveals the startling effects of the mental and physical abuse he'd endured.

episodes.title: Binding Wish
episodes.plot: Zheng's flashback shows the lengths to which a black marketeer was willing to go to make sure he got home and became King of Qin, against all odds.

episodes.title: Broken Love
episodes.plot: As Zheng and his supporters await word from the Inner Palace, the Queen Dowager reveals where her allegiances lie. Xiang is put in a tight spot.

episodes.title: Assemblage
episodes.plot: Xiang struggles to bring Zheng some shocking news. The Qin army mounts its offensive against Wei's Gaolang Castle, but is Xin in over his head?

episodes.title: Siege of Gaolang Castle
episodes.plot: Wang Ben's Yu Feng Force tries unconventional tactics to gain ground in the siege of Gaolang Castle. LÃ¼ Buwei's actions start to have consequences.

episodes.title: My Way of Fighting
episodes.plot: As Qin's war against Wei rages on, Xin follows his convictions only to land in hot water. A new opponent emerges that could turn the tide of battle.

episodes.title: The Man Lian Po
episodes.plot: Lian Po, once one of Zhao's Three Greats, is called to the battlefield again. The Fei Xin Force tries unconventional tactics to storm Jinliguan.

episodes.title: Air of a Military Commander
episodes.plot: An assassin is picking off Qin's thousand-man commanders! Xin encounters a formidable young man who sees promise in the scrappy Fei Xin leader.

episodes.title: Midnight Great General
episodes.plot: Lian Po gives his reasons for returning to the battlefield. A chance meeting in the dead of night could have a major impact on Xin's military career.

episodes.title: The Night Before the Start of War
episodes.plot: Xin settles into his new position as the Qin army prepares for a battle that could change the face of China. Qiang Lei discusses her plans with Xin.

episodes.title: Clash!
episodes.plot: The battle at Shanyang is underway. Xin and his fellow temporary thousand-man commanders must face the fearsome Lian Po--and the deadly Lun Hu.

episodes.title: Xuan Feng's Scheme
episodes.plot: As Wang Ben and the Yu Feng Force do battle with Lun Hu, the Fei Xin Force is called into battle. A devious strategy takes the Qin army by surprise.

episodes.title: The Feixin Unit's Counterattack
episodes.plot: The Qin army is at a standstill in their battle against Wei--until Qiang Lei devises a workaround. Will her idea be enough for them to claim victory?

episodes.title: The Thief vs. the Strategist
episodes.plot: Meng Ao's lieutenant Huan Yi takes the battlefield with some real tricks up his sleeve. The Wei army must scramble to beat him at his own game.

episodes.title: Meng Tian's Proposal
episodes.plot: After Huan Yi's masterstroke, Meng Tian suggests the Le Hua, Yu Feng, and Fei Xin Forces team up in the hopes of leaving their own mark on history.

episodes.title: United Front of Three Units
episodes.plot: Meng Tian skillfully brings all three special forces together in his plan to eliminate Lun Hu, but will the shrewd assassin fall prey to his scheme?

episodes.title: A Wall That Must Be Overcome
episodes.plot: Bi gets a surprise visit and a new role in the battle against Wei, while Wang Ben and Xin fight against time to put an end to the masterful Lun Hu.

episodes.title: Double Bluff
episodes.plot: Lieutenant Wang Jian's plot comes to fruition with help from the skillful Commander Bi, but the battle--and the battle of wits--is far from over.

episodes.title: The Caliber of a General
episodes.plot: Lian Po judges Wang Jian's worth as a commander, while a badly injured Xin returns to camp. The end of the Shanyang Offensive is in sight at last.

episodes.title: The Hour of Conclusion
episodes.plot: The Le Hua, Yu Feng, and Fei Xin Forces find themselves bringing up the rear in the final battle. Lian Po makes a daring move to get the ball rolling.

episodes.title: The Final Plan
episodes.plot: Meng Ao reveals a surprising strategy for taking on Lian Po in hopes of finally claiming victory over his rival. Xin's battle with Lun Hu intensifies.

episodes.title: A Single Moment
episodes.plot: Xin must cope with a grave injury in his fight to take Lun Hu's head. Lian Po continues his seemingly unstoppable march on Meng Ao's main camp.

episodes.title: Precious Comrades
episodes.plot: As his battle with Lun Hu ends, Xin remembers the people he met along his path. Jie Zifang's men launch a brutal attack against the wounded Qiang Lei.

episodes.title: Meng Ao, Standing Firm
episodes.plot: It's a showdown between Meng Ao and Lian Po as the mighty generals face each other for the first time in forty years. Will Meng Ao have his revenge?

episodes.title: Unfading Era
episodes.plot: Meng Ao encourages Lian Po to leave the past behind and embrace a new era. Bai Guixi gets an unexpected visitor that could turn the tables on Wei.

episodes.title: Victory... And...
episodes.plot: With the Shanyang Offensive over, Lian Po shares with Xin a sure way of achieving great fame and glory. Qiang Lei prepares to leave the Fei Xin Force.

episodes.title: The Strategist Arrives
episodes.plot: Despite the recognition Xin receives after the Shanyang Offensive, the Fei Xin Force just hasn't been the same. Perhaps a new tactician is in order...

episodes.title: Trial and Resolve
episodes.plot: The Fei Xin Force is eyeing tactician He Liao Diao with great distrust, but who else can think up a way to deal with the latest wave of Wei attackers?

episodes.title: Outwit
episodes.plot: He Liao Diao pulls out all the stops in a strategy meant to shut down Wei troops bent on revenge for the Fei Xin Force's fierce battle at Shanyang.

episodes.title: Distant Thunder
episodes.plot: Zhao makes a surprising move, while the Fei Xin Force makes a discovery. Back in Xianyang, Zheng reveals a trump card in the Court's power struggle.

episodes.title: Stage of Strategy
episodes.plot: Zheng approaches his stepbrother for help ousting LÃ¼ Buwei. The Fei Xin Force fights to defend a tiny country and stumbles onto something huge.

episodes.title: A New Legend
episodes.plot: New ministers take positions in the Royal Court, and Xiang has big news for Zheng. Xin sees a potential problem as a way to get closer to his goal.

episodes.title: The Boy with No Name
episodes.plot: Shin and Hyou are two slaves who have grown as sword training buddies and pseudo brothers with a common dream of growing up to be great generals.

episodes.title: An Encounter with Destiny
episodes.plot: Xin discovers Ying Zheng, the young King of Qin, who's fleeing his half-brother's uprising. After learning that Piao died serving as Zheng's stand-in, he must decide whether or not he should help Piao's doppelganger.

episodes.title: For a Friend
episodes.plot: As his battle with Lun Hu ends, Xin remembers the people he met along his path. Jie Zifang's men launch a brutal attack against the wounded Qiang Lei.

episodes.title: The King and the Sword
episodes.plot: Fleeing pursuit, Zheng and Xin struggle with exhaustion and with each other. When they reach the appointed meeting site, there's no sign of Zheng's sole supporter, Lord Changwen . . . and the murderous tracker Mu Ta is hot on their trail.

episodes.title: Unbroken Heart
episodes.plot: Xin must singlehandedly face the treacherous assassin, Mu Ta. Meanwhile, General Wang Yi brings a piece of tribute to the Court that seems to spell the end for all young King Zheng's hopes.

episodes.title: The Path to Becoming a General
episodes.plot: Cho Hak-ju has chilling words for the Queen, who's hiding a sinister secret. Prince Chang orders Sangju's defenses, but Seo-bi senses something awry.

episodes.title: The Fearsome Folk of the Mountains
episodes.plot: The episode starts with Ei Sei and the others climbing up a trail to get to the mountain king's keep. Ka Ryo Ten is confused because he did not know the mountain people had a king like Qin did.

episodes.title: Each One's Dream
episodes.plot:

episodes.title: On to Xianyang
episodes.plot: What will happen now that Ei Sei has the mountain people's alliance? Will our heroes be able to take back the throne?

episodes.title: First Campaign
episodes.plot: Shin enlists in the war between Chin and Gi kingdom. This is his first campaign as foot soldier. Mysterious Kyou Kai enters. With Corporal Taku Kei, Shin forms the weakest five squad

episodes.title: Wang Yi Take's the Field!
episodes.plot: Shins(Li Xin) squad is halved in one night. Now with no protection his squad is attacked. Luckily Ou Ki arrives with full force. With general on the field the war situation starts to change.

episodes.title: The Main Attraction
episodes.plot: Troubling news reaches the kings court. Chin army and Sho army faces each other. There might be a hidden trap awaiting Chin army.

episodes.title: Commanding Generals Face to Face
episodes.plot: Generals of both army have an intense duel. Hou ken may have the upper hand.

episodes.title: Wang Yi and Liao
episodes.plot: King Sei comes to know about the past of Ou Ki and Kyou. Kyou, one of the six great generals of Chin was a woman and was the daughter of the great king Sho.

episodes.title: I Stand on the Verge of Death
episodes.plot: The reserved army of Sho joins the fight and entraps the Chin army. 6000 Chin Vs 40000 Sho. Ou Ki still believes in Chin army and leads them with pride.

episodes.title: Succession
episodes.plot: Battle draws to an end. Ou Ki's life hangs in balance as Shin jumps in the battle to rescue the wounded general. Sho army decides to retreat.
